articles.content: Umran Malik has not just impressed with pace, but also with wickets. In the first ODI match between India and Sri Lanka at the Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati, Umran finished with figures of 3 … [+2346 chars]

articles.title: No change to Stars squad - Melbourne Stars
articles.description: The Melbourne Stars have named a squad of 14 players for the match against the Adelaide Strikers tomorrow night at the MCG.
articles.content:
Marcus Stoinis is still recovering from a hamstring strain.

articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "Maybe Time To Prepare For Life Without Jasprit Bumrah": Ex-India Cricketer Issues Big Warning - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Former India cricketer Aakash Chopra feels it's time for the Indian team to prepare for life without Jasprit Bumrah. Chopra's comments came after the pacer was ruled out the 3-match ODI series against Sri Lanka.
articles.content: Indian cricket team suffered an early blow on Monday as the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) confirmed that the marquee pacer has been ruled out of the 3-match ODI series against Sri Lank… [+1982 chars]
